Blizzard.name: Blizzard
Blizzard.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Snow, this move does not check accuracy.
Blizzard.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze foe(s). Can't miss in Snow.

Aurora Veil.name: Aurora Veil
Aurora Veil.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical and special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle; does not reduce damage further with Reflect or Light Screen. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Brick Break and Psychic Fangs remove the effect before damage is calculated. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails unless the weather is Snow.
Aurora Veil.shortDesc: For 5 turns, damage to allies halved. Snow only.

Wood Hammer.name: Wood Hammer
Wood Hammer.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

Earthquake.name: Earthquake
Earthquake.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
Earthquake.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dig.

Alluring Voice.name: Alluring Voice
Alluring Voice.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target if it had a stat stage raised this turn.
Alluring Voice.shortDesc: 100% confuse target that had a stat rise this turn.

Calm Mind.name: Calm Mind
Calm Mind.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
Calm Mind.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk and Sp. Def by 1.

Recover.name: Recover
Recover.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
Recover.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

Psychic.name: Psychic
Psychic.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Psychic.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Psyshock.name: Psyshock
Psyshock.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
Psyshock.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

Tera Blast.name: Tera Blast
Tera Blast.desc: If the user is Terastallized, this move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes, and this move's type becomes the same as the user's Tera Type. In addition, if the user's Tera Type is Stellar, this move has 100 power, is super effective against Terastallized targets and neutral against other targets, and lowers the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
Tera Blast.shortDesc: If Terastallized: Phys. if Atk > SpA, type = Tera.

Flip Turn.name: Flip Turn
Flip Turn.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
Flip Turn.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

Protect.name: Protect
Protect.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
Protect.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

Scald.name: Scald
Scald.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
Scald.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

Wish.name: Wish
Wish.desc: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of the user's maximum HP restored to it, rounded down. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position.
Wish.shortDesc: Next turn, 50% of the user's max HP is restored.

Brave Bird.name: Brave Bird
Brave Bird.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

Dragon Dance.name: Dragon Dance
Dragon Dance.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
Dragon Dance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1.

Roost.name: Roost
Roost.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user is not Terastallized, until the end of the turn Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
Roost.shortDesc: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

Defog.name: Defog
Defog.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness. If there is a terrain active and this move is successful, the terrain will be cleared.
Defog.shortDesc: -1 evasion; clears terrain and hazards on both sides.

Haze.name: Haze
Haze.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.

Double-Edge.name: Double-Edge
Double-Edge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

Fake Out.name: Fake Out
Fake Out.desc: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
Fake Out.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

Knock Off.name: Knock Off
Knock Off.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
Knock Off.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

Low Kick.name: Low Kick
Low Kick.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
Low Kick.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

U-turn.name: U-turn
U-turn.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
U-turn.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

Triple Axel.name: Triple Axel
Triple Axel.desc: Hits three times. Power increases to 40 for the second hit and 60 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit three times.
Triple Axel.shortDesc: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

Giga Drain.name: Giga Drain
Giga Drain.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
Giga Drain.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

Sludge Bomb.name: Sludge Bomb
Sludge Bomb.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Spore.name: Spore
Spore.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
Spore.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Toxic.name: Toxic
Toxic.desc: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.
Toxic.shortDesc: Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.

Clear Smog.name: Clear Smog
Clear Smog.desc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.
Clear Smog.shortDesc: Resets all of the target's stat stages to 0.

Stomping Tantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
Stomping Tantrum.desc: Power doubles if the user's last move on the previous turn, including moves called by other moves or those used through Instruct, Magic Coat, Snatch, or the Dancer or Magic Bounce Abilities, failed to do any of its normal effects, not including damage from an unsuccessful High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, or Mind Blown, or if the user was prevented from moving by any effect other than recharging or Sky Drop. A move that was blocked by Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, Spiky Shield, Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard will not double this move's power, nor will Bounce or Fly ending early due to the effect of Gravity, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
Stomping Tantrum.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

Dazzling Gleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
Dazzling Gleam.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Focus Blast.name: Focus Blast
Focus Blast.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Focus Blast.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Volt Switch.name: Volt Switch
Volt Switch.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
Volt Switch.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

Thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
Thunderbolt.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

Discharge.name: Discharge
Discharge.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Agility.name: Agility
Agility.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

Bulk Up.name: Bulk Up
Bulk Up.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
Bulk Up.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

Drain Punch.name: Drain Punch
Drain Punch.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
Drain Punch.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

Rage Fist.name: Rage Fist
Rage Fist.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times the user has been hit by a damaging attack during the battle, even if the user did not lose HP from the attack. X cannot be greater than 6 and does not reset upon switching out or fainting. Each hit of a multi-hit attack is counted, but confusion damage is not counted.
Rage Fist.shortDesc: +50 power for each time user was hit. Max 6 hits.

Rest.name: Rest
Rest.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
Rest.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

Taunt.name: Taunt
Taunt.desc: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
Taunt.shortDesc: Target can't use status moves its next 3 turns.

Gunk Shot.name: Gunk Shot
Gunk Shot.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Apple Acid.name: Apple Acid
Apple Acid.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Apple Acid.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Leech Seed.name: Leech Seed
Leech Seed.desc: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Mortal Spin or Rapid Spin successfully, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.
Leech Seed.shortDesc: 1/8 of target's HP is restored to user every turn.

Draco Meteor.name: Draco Meteor
Draco Meteor.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Draco Meteor.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Leech Life.name: Leech Life
Leech Life.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
Leech Life.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

Liquidation.name: Liquidation
Liquidation.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
Liquidation.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Sticky Web.name: Sticky Web
Sticky Web.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, lowering the Speed by 1 stage of each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
Sticky Web.shortDesc: Lowers Speed of grounded foes by 1 on switch-in.

Mirror Coat.name: Mirror Coat
Mirror Coat.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.
Mirror Coat.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

Coil.name: Coil
Coil.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by 1 stage.
Coil.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack, Defense, accuracy by 1.

Sucker Punch.name: Sucker Punch
Sucker Punch.desc: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
Sucker Punch.shortDesc: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

Toxic Spikes.name: Toxic Spikes
Toxic Spikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, poisoning each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to two times before failing. Opposing Pokemon become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the opposing party from being poisoned on switch-in, but a substitute does not.
Toxic Spikes.shortDesc: Poisons grounded foes on switch-in. Max 2 layers.

Trailblaze.name: Trailblaze
Trailblaze.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
Trailblaze.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

Earth Power.name: Earth Power
Earth Power.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Earth Power.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Energy Ball.name: Energy Ball
Energy Ball.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Energy Ball.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Hyper Voice.name: Hyper Voice
Hyper Voice.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Strength Sap.name: Strength Sap
Strength Sap.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat calculated with its stat stage before this move was used. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Fails if the target's Attack stat stage is -6.
Strength Sap.shortDesc: User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.

Substitute.name: Substitute
Substitute.desc: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
Substitute.shortDesc: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

Flare Blitz.name: Flare Blitz
Flare Blitz.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
Flare Blitz.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

Close Combat.name: Close Combat
Close Combat.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
Close Combat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

Morning Sun.name: Morning Sun
Morning Sun.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
Morning Sun.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

Wild Charge.name: Wild Charge
Wild Charge.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

Roar.name: Roar
Roar.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
Roar.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

Head Smash.name: Head Smash
Head Smash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

Shadow Claw.name: Shadow Claw
Shadow Claw.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Swords Dance.name: Swords Dance
Swords Dance.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.

Fire Blast.name: Fire Blast
Fire Blast.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Judgment.name: Judgment
Judgment.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Plate.
Judgment.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Plate.

Ice Beam.name: Ice Beam
Ice Beam.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

Outrage.name: Outrage
Outrage.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
Outrage.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

Body Press.name: Body Press
Body Press.desc: Damage is calculated using the user's Defense stat as its Attack, including stat stage changes. Other effects that modify the Attack stat are used as normal.
Body Press.shortDesc: Uses user's Def stat as Atk in damage calculation.

Iron Defense.name: Iron Defense
Iron Defense.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

Shadow Ball.name: Shadow Ball
Shadow Ball.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Shadow Ball.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Cosmic Power.name: Cosmic Power
Cosmic Power.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
Cosmic Power.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

Stored Power.name: Stored Power
Stored Power.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
Stored Power.shortDesc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

Stone Edge.name: Stone Edge
Stone Edge.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Iron Head.name: Iron Head
Iron Head.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Iron Head.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Flash Cannon.name: Flash Cannon
Flash Cannon.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Flash Cannon.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Dragon Tail.name: Dragon Tail
Dragon Tail.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.
Dragon Tail.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

Thunder Wave.name: Thunder Wave
Thunder Wave.desc: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.

Stealth Rock.name: Stealth Rock
Stealth Rock.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
Stealth Rock.shortDesc: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

Poison Jab.name: Poison Jab
Poison Jab.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Armor Cannon.name: Armor Cannon
Armor Cannon.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
Armor Cannon.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

Aura Sphere.name: Aura Sphere
Aura Sphere.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
Aura Sphere.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

Meteor Beam.name: Meteor Beam
Meteor Beam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
Meteor Beam.shortDesc: Raises user's Sp. Atk by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

Freeze-Dry.name: Freeze-Dry
Freeze-Dry.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
Freeze-Dry.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.

Freezing Glare.name: Freezing Glare
Freezing Glare.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

Hurricane.name: Hurricane
Hurricane.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
Hurricane.shortDesc: 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.

Avalanche.name: Avalanche
Avalanche.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
Avalanche.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

Rapid Spin.name: Rapid Spin
Rapid Spin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
Rapid Spin.shortDesc: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.

Curse.name: Curse
Curse.desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.
Curse.shortDesc: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.

Explosion.name: Explosion
Explosion.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
Explosion.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

Encore.name: Encore
Encore.desc: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Assist, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Encore, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
Encore.shortDesc: Target repeats its last move for its next 3 turns.

Nasty Plot.name: Nasty Plot
Nasty Plot.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Nasty Plot.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Trick.name: Trick
Trick.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
Trick.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

Play Rough.name: Play Rough
Play Rough.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
Play Rough.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

Superpower.name: Superpower
Superpower.desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
Superpower.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

Ice Spinner.name: Ice Spinner
Ice Spinner.desc: Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.

Belly Drum.name: Belly Drum
Belly Drum.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 12 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack stat stage is 6.
Belly Drum.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Maximizes Attack.

Poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
Poltergeist.desc: Fails if the target has no held item.
Poltergeist.shortDesc: Fails if the target has no held item.

Waterfall.name: Waterfall
Waterfall.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
Waterfall.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Psychic Fangs.name: Psychic Fangs
Psychic Fangs.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
Psychic Fangs.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

Throat Chop.name: Throat Chop
Throat Chop.desc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound-based moves.
Throat Chop.shortDesc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound moves.

Wave Crash.name: Wave Crash
Wave Crash.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

Foul Play.name: Foul Play
Foul Play.desc: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
Foul Play.shortDesc: Uses target's Attack stat in damage calculation.

Glaive Rush.name: Glaive Rush
Glaive Rush.desc: If this move is successful, moves targeted at the user deal double damage and do not check accuracy until the user's next turn.
Glaive Rush.shortDesc: User takes sure-hit 2x damage until its next turn.

Icicle Crash.name: Icicle Crash
Icicle Crash.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Icicle Crash.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Icicle Spear.name: Icicle Spear
Icicle Spear.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Scale Shot.name: Scale Shot
Scale Shot.desc: Hits two to five times. Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage and raises the user's Speed by 1 stage after the last hit. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
Scale Shot.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times. User: -1 Def, +1 Spe after last hit.

Snowscape.name: Snowscape
Snowscape.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. During the effect, the Defense of Ice-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a physical attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Snow.
Snowscape.shortDesc: For 5 turns, snow falls. Ice: 1.5x Def.

Muddy Water.name: Muddy Water
Muddy Water.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
Muddy Water.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

Slack Off.name: Slack Off
Slack Off.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
Slack Off.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

Quiver Dance.name: Quiver Dance
Quiver Dance.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
Quiver Dance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

Moonblast.name: Moonblast
Moonblast.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Moonblast.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

Sleep Powder.name: Sleep Powder
Sleep Powder.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
Sleep Powder.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Shell Smash.name: Shell Smash
Shell Smash.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.
Shell Smash.shortDesc: Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.

Seismic Toss.name: Seismic Toss
Seismic Toss.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
Seismic Toss.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

Soft-Boiled.name: Soft-Boiled
Soft-Boiled.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
Soft-Boiled.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

Heal Bell.name: Heal Bell
Heal Bell.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
Heal Bell.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

Spikes.name: Spikes
Spikes.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
Spikes.shortDesc: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

Esper Wing.name: Esper Wing
Esper Wing.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage and a higher chance for a critical hit.
Esper Wing.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise user Speed by 1. High crit.

Heat Wave.name: Heat Wave
Heat Wave.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Bullet Seed.name: Bullet Seed
Bullet Seed.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Rock Tomb.name: Rock Tomb
Rock Tomb.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
Rock Tomb.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

Psychic Noise.name: Psychic Noise
Psychic Noise.desc: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
Psychic Noise.shortDesc: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from healing.

Hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
Hypnosis.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep.
Hypnosis.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

Crunch.name: Crunch
Crunch.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
Crunch.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Ice Fang.name: Ice Fang
Ice Fang.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
Ice Fang.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. 10% chance to flinch.

Leaf Storm.name: Leaf Storm
Leaf Storm.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Leaf Storm.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Glacial Lance.name: Glacial Lance
Glacial Lance.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Trick Room.name: Trick Room
Trick Room.desc: For 5 turns, the Speed of every Pokemon is recalculated for the purposes of determining turn order. During the effect, each Pokemon's Speed is considered to be (10000 - its normal Speed), and if this value is greater than 8191, 8192 is subtracted from it. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
Trick Room.shortDesc: Goes last. For 5 turns, turn order is reversed.

Astral Barrage.name: Astral Barrage
Astral Barrage.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Pollen Puff.name: Pollen Puff
Pollen Puff.desc: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
Pollen Puff.shortDesc: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.

Overheat.name: Overheat
Overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Overheat.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Rock Polish.name: Rock Polish
Rock Polish.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.

Bitter Blade.name: Bitter Blade
Bitter Blade.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
Bitter Blade.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

Pain Split.name: Pain Split
Pain Split.desc: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
Pain Split.shortDesc: Shares HP of user and target equally.

Flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
Flamethrower.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Synthesis.name: Synthesis
Synthesis.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
Synthesis.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

Dark Pulse.name: Dark Pulse
Dark Pulse.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
Dark Pulse.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Sacred Sword.name: Sacred Sword
Sacred Sword.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
Sacred Sword.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

Tail Slap.name: Tail Slap
Tail Slap.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Tidy Up.name: Tidy Up
Tidy Up.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage. Removes subtitutes from all active Pokemon and ends the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes for both sides.
Tidy Up.shortDesc: User +1 Atk, Spe. Clears all substitutes/hazards.

High Jump Kick.name: High Jump Kick
High Jump Kick.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
High Jump Kick.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

Pyro Ball.name: Pyro Ball
Pyro Ball.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
Pyro Ball.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

Court Change.name: Court Change
Court Change.desc: Switches the Mist, Light Screen, Reflect, Spikes, Safeguard, Tailwind, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, Water Pledge, Fire Pledge, Grass Pledge, Sticky Web, Aurora Veil, G-Max Steelsurge, G-Max Cannonade, G-Max Vine Lash, and G-Max Wildfire effects from the user's side to the opposing side and vice versa.
Court Change.shortDesc: Swaps user's field effects with the opposing side.

Water Pulse.name: Water Pulse
Water Pulse.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Moonlight.name: Moonlight
Moonlight.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow, all rounded half down.
Moonlight.shortDesc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

Drill Run.name: Drill Run
Drill Run.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Rock Blast.name: Rock Blast
Rock Blast.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.

Draining Kiss.name: Draining Kiss
Draining Kiss.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
Draining Kiss.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

Facade.name: Facade
Facade.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
Facade.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

Rock Slide.name: Rock Slide
Rock Slide.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Rock Slide.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

Heavy Slam.name: Heavy Slam
Heavy Slam.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
Heavy Slam.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

Heat Crash.name: Heat Crash
Heat Crash.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
Heat Crash.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

Supercell Slam.name: Supercell Slam
Supercell Slam.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
Supercell Slam.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

Ice Hammer.name: Ice Hammer
Ice Hammer.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.

Surf.name: Surf
Surf.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive.
Surf.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dive.

Crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
Crabhammer.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Shed Tail.name: Shed Tail
Shed Tail.desc: The user takes 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, and creates a substitute that has 1/4 of the user's maximum HP, rounded down. The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party and the selected Pokemon has the substitute transferred to it. Fails if the user would faint, or if there are no unfainted party members.
Shed Tail.shortDesc: User takes 1/2 its max HP to pass a substitute.

Spirit Shackle.name: Spirit Shackle
Spirit Shackle.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
Spirit Shackle.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

Leaf Blade.name: Leaf Blade
Leaf Blade.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Triple Arrows.name: Triple Arrows
Triple Arrows.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage, a 30% chance to make it flinch, and a higher chance for a critical hit.

Super Fang.name: Super Fang
Super Fang.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
Super Fang.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

Nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
Nuzzle.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

Grass Knot.name: Grass Knot
Grass Knot.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
Grass Knot.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

Psycho Boost.name: Psycho Boost
Psycho Boost.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Psycho Boost.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Night Shade.name: Night Shade
Night Shade.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
Night Shade.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.

Diamond Storm.name: Diamond Storm
Diamond Storm.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by 2 stages.
Diamond Storm.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise user's Defense by 2.

Transform.name: Transform
Transform.desc: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, gender, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP, with a maximum of 5 PP each. The user can no longer change formes if it would have the ability to do so. This move fails if it hits a substitute, if either the user or the target is already transformed, or if either is behind an Illusion.
Transform.shortDesc: Copies target's stats, moves, types, and Ability.

Sleep Talk.name: Sleep Talk
Sleep Talk.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, Wicked Torque, or any two-turn move.
Sleep Talk.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

Sludge Wave.name: Sludge Wave
Sludge Wave.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

Dragon Darts.name: Dragon Darts
Dragon Darts.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. In Double Battles, this move attempts to hit the targeted Pokemon and its ally once each. If hitting one of these Pokemon would be prevented by immunity, protection, semi-invulnerability, an Ability, or accuracy, it attempts to hit the other Pokemon twice instead. If this move is redirected, it hits that target twice.
Dragon Darts.shortDesc: Hits twice. Doubles: Tries to hit each foe once.

Air Slash.name: Air Slash
Air Slash.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Air Slash.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Boomburst.name: Boomburst
Boomburst.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

Headbutt.name: Headbutt
Headbutt.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Headbutt.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Body Slam.name: Body Slam
Body Slam.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.

Focus Punch.name: Focus Punch
Focus Punch.desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.
Focus Punch.shortDesc: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

Fire Punch.name: Fire Punch
Fire Punch.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Zen Headbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
Zen Headbutt.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
Zen Headbutt.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Ice Punch.name: Ice Punch
Ice Punch.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

Yawn.name: Yawn
Yawn.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a non-volatile status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still active, does not have a non-volatile status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep. If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.
Yawn.shortDesc: Puts the target to sleep after 1 turn.

Mystical Fire.name: Mystical Fire
Mystical Fire.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Mystical Fire.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

Sacred Fire.name: Sacred Fire
Sacred Fire.desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
Sacred Fire.shortDesc: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

Lumina Crash.name: Lumina Crash
Lumina Crash.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
Lumina Crash.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

No Retreat.name: No Retreat
No Retreat.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage, but it becomes prevented from switching out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. Fails if the user has already been prevented from switching by this effect.
No Retreat.shortDesc: Raises all stats by 1 (not acc/eva). Traps user.

Future Sight.name: Future Sight
Future Sight.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
Future Sight.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

Beat Up.name: Beat Up
Beat Up.desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a non-volatile status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.
Beat Up.shortDesc: All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.

Grav Apple.name: Grav Apple
Grav Apple.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Power is multiplied by 1.5 during Gravity's effect.

Destiny Bond.name: Destiny Bond
Destiny Bond.desc: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability.
Destiny Bond.shortDesc: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.

Bug Buzz.name: Bug Buzz
Bug Buzz.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Bug Buzz.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Brick Break.name: Brick Break
Brick Break.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
Brick Break.shortDesc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

Night Slash.name: Night Slash
Night Slash.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Psycho Cut.name: Psycho Cut
Psycho Cut.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Thunder.name: Thunder
Thunder.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
Thunder.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze. Can't miss in rain.

Fire Fang.name: Fire Fang
Fire Fang.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
Fire Fang.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.

Healing Wish.name: Healing Wish
Healing Wish.desc: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP is fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets either of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
Healing Wish.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.

Salt Cure.name: Salt Cure
Salt Cure.desc: Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/4 if the target is Steel or Water type), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
Salt Cure.shortDesc: Deals 1/8 max HP each turn; 1/4 on Steel, Water.

Make It Rain.name: Make It Rain
Make It Rain.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Make It Rain.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 1. Hits foe(s).

Mud Shot.name: Mud Shot
Mud Shot.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
Mud Shot.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

Disable.name: Disable
Disable.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move was a Max or G-Max Move.
Disable.shortDesc: For 4 turns, disables the target's last move used.

Mortal Spin.name: Mortal Spin
Mortal Spin.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to poison the target.
Mortal Spin.shortDesc: Poisons foes, frees user from hazards/bind/leech.

Horn Leech.name: Horn Leech
Horn Leech.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
Horn Leech.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

Milk Drink.name: Milk Drink
Milk Drink.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
Milk Drink.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

Dynamic Punch.name: Dynamic Punch
Dynamic Punch.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

Parting Shot.name: Parting Shot
Parting Shot.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.
Parting Shot.shortDesc: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.

Headlong Rush.name: Headlong Rush
Headlong Rush.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
Headlong Rush.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

Spirit Break.name: Spirit Break
Spirit Break.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Spirit Break.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

Light Screen.name: Light Screen
Light Screen.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
Light Screen.shortDesc: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

Reflect.name: Reflect
Reflect.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
Reflect.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

Precipice Blades.name: Precipice Blades
Precipice Blades.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Temper Flare.name: Temper Flare
Temper Flare.desc: Power doubles if the user's last move on the previous turn, including moves called by other moves or those used through Instruct, Magic Coat, Snatch, or the Dancer or Magic Bounce Abilities, failed to do any of its normal effects, not including damage from an unsuccessful High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, or Mind Blown, or if the user was prevented from moving by any effect other than recharging or Sky Drop. A move that was blocked by Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, Spiky Shield, Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard will not double this move's power, nor will Bounce or Fly ending early due to the effect of Gravity, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
Temper Flare.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

Acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
Acrobatics.desc: Power doubles if the user has no held item.
Acrobatics.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user has no held item.

Magma Storm.name: Magma Storm
Magma Storm.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
Magma Storm.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

Lava Plume.name: Lava Plume
Lava Plume.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
Whirlwind.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

Lash Out.name: Lash Out
Lash Out.desc: Power doubles if the user had a stat stage lowered this turn.
Lash Out.shortDesc: 2x power if the user had a stat lowered this turn.

Hyperspace Fury.name: Hyperspace Fury
Hyperspace Fury.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Hoopa Unbound. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
Hyperspace Fury.shortDesc: Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protect.

Fickle Beam.name: Fickle Beam
Fickle Beam.desc: Has a 30% chance this move's power is doubled.
Fickle Beam.shortDesc: Has a 30% chance this move's power is doubled.

Expanding Force.name: Expanding Force
Expanding Force.desc: If the current terrain is Psychic Terrain and the user is grounded, this move hits all opposing Pokemon and has its power multiplied by 1.5.
Expanding Force.shortDesc: User on Psychic Terrain: 1.5x power, hits foes.

Tachyon Cutter.name: Tachyon Cutter
Tachyon Cutter.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. This move does not check accuracy.
Tachyon Cutter.shortDesc: Hits twice. This move does not check accuracy.

Thunder Punch.name: Thunder Punch
Thunder Punch.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

Psyblade.name: Psyblade
Psyblade.desc: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5.

Fiery Dance.name: Fiery Dance
Fiery Dance.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
Fiery Dance.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

Secret Sword.name: Secret Sword
Secret Sword.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
Secret Sword.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

Kowtow Cleave.name: Kowtow Cleave
Kowtow Cleave.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
Kowtow Cleave.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

Rain Dance.name: Rain Dance
Rain Dance.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
Rain Dance.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

Stone Axe.name: Stone Axe
Stone Axe.desc: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
Stone Axe.shortDesc: Sets Stealth Rock on the target's side.

Magnet Rise.name: Magnet Rise
Magnet Rise.desc: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
Magnet Rise.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.

Clanging Scales.name: Clanging Scales
Clanging Scales.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage.

Clangorous Soul.name: Clangorous Soul
Clangorous Soul.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage in exchange for the user losing 33% of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed stat stages would not change.
Clangorous Soul.shortDesc: User loses 33% of its max HP. +1 to all stats.

Collision Course.name: Collision Course
Collision Course.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.

Pounce.name: Pounce
Pounce.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
Pounce.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

Origin Pulse.name: Origin Pulse
Origin Pulse.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

Water Spout.name: Water Spout
Water Spout.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
Water Spout.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

Fusion Bolt.name: Fusion Bolt
Fusion Bolt.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.
Fusion Bolt.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare this turn.

Fusion Flare.name: Fusion Flare
Fusion Flare.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.
Fusion Flare.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt this turn.

Sparkling Aria.name: Sparkling Aria
Sparkling Aria.desc: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn.
Sparkling Aria.shortDesc: The target is cured of its burn.

Luster Purge.name: Luster Purge
Luster Purge.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
Luster Purge.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

Lunge.name: Lunge
Lunge.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
Lunge.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

Petal Dance.name: Petal Dance
Petal Dance.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
Petal Dance.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

Victory Dance.name: Victory Dance
Victory Dance.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
Victory Dance.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Speed by 1.

First Impression.name: First Impression
First Impression.desc: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
First Impression.shortDesc: Nearly always goes first. First turn out only.

Meteor Mash.name: Meteor Mash
Meteor Mash.desc: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
Meteor Mash.shortDesc: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

Aeroblast.name: Aeroblast
Aeroblast.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Moongeist Beam.name: Moongeist Beam
Moongeist Beam.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Moongeist Beam.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

Endeavor.name: Endeavor
Endeavor.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
Endeavor.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

Whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
Whirlpool.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
Whirlpool.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

Retaliate.name: Retaliate
Retaliate.desc: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.
Retaliate.shortDesc: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.

Fleur Cannon.name: Fleur Cannon
Fleur Cannon.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
Fleur Cannon.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Shift Gear.name: Shift Gear
Shift Gear.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.
Shift Gear.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

Scorching Sands.name: Scorching Sands
Scorching Sands.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
Scorching Sands.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

Tail Glow.name: Tail Glow
Tail Glow.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.
Tail Glow.shortDesc: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Bite.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Population Bomb.name: Population Bomb
Population Bomb.desc: Hits ten times. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit ten times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move hits four to ten times at random without checking accuracy between hits.
Population Bomb.shortDesc: Hits 10 times. Each hit can miss.

Petal Blizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
Petal Blizzard.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

Relic Song.name: Relic Song
Relic Song.desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Sheer Force Ability. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
Relic Song.shortDesc: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.

Flower Trick.name: Flower Trick
Flower Trick.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities. This move does not check accuracy.
Flower Trick.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit; no accuracy check.

Psystrike.name: Psystrike
Psystrike.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
Psystrike.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

Poison Fang.name: Poison Fang
Poison Fang.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
Poison Fang.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

Electro Drift.name: Electro Drift
Electro Drift.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.

Fiery Wrath.name: Fiery Wrath
Fiery Wrath.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
Fiery Wrath.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

Aura Wheel.name: Aura Wheel
Aura Wheel.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage. If the user is a Morpeko in Full Belly Mode, this move is Electric type. If the user is a Morpeko in Hangry Mode, this move is Dark type. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Full Belly or Hangry Mode Morpeko.

Photon Geyser.name: Photon Geyser
Photon Geyser.desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Photon Geyser.shortDesc: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.

Sunsteel Strike.name: Sunsteel Strike
Sunsteel Strike.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
Sunsteel Strike.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

Solar Beam.name: Solar Beam
Solar Beam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
Solar Beam.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

Ivy Cudgel.name: Ivy Cudgel
Ivy Cudgel.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. If the user is an Ogerpon holding a mask, this move's type changes to match. Water type for Wellspring Mask, Fire type for Hearthflame Mask, and Rock type for Cornerstone Mask.
Ivy Cudgel.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Type depends on user's form.

Revelation Dance.name: Revelation Dance
Revelation Dance.desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type. If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone.
Revelation Dance.shortDesc: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

Iron Tail.name: Iron Tail
Iron Tail.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
Iron Tail.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Spacial Rend.name: Spacial Rend
Spacial Rend.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

Shore Up.name: Shore Up
Shore Up.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half down. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
Shore Up.shortDesc: User restores 1/2 its max HP; 2/3 in Sandstorm.

Double Shock.name: Double Shock
Double Shock.desc: Fails unless the user is an Electric type. If this move is successful and the user is not Terastallized, the user's Electric type becomes typeless as long as it remains active.
Double Shock.shortDesc: User's Electric type: typeless; must be Electric.

Revival Blessing.name: Revival Blessing
Revival Blessing.desc: A fainted party member is selected and revived with 1/2 its max HP, rounded down. Fails if there are no fainted party members.
Revival Blessing.shortDesc: Revives a fainted Pokemon to 50% HP.

Malignant Chain.name: Malignant Chain
Malignant Chain.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
Malignant Chain.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

Weather Ball.name: Weather Ball
Weather Ball.desc: Power doubles if a weather condition other than Delta Stream is active, and this move's type changes to match. Ice type during Snow, Water type during Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Desolate Land or Sunny Day. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and uses Weather Ball during Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Desolate Land, or Sunny Day, this move remains Normal type and does not double in power.
Weather Ball.shortDesc: Power doubles and type varies in each weather.

Switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
Switcheroo.desc: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
Switcheroo.shortDesc: User switches its held item with the target's.

Take Heart.name: Take Heart
Take Heart.desc: The user cures its non-volatile status condition. Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage.
Take Heart.shortDesc: Cures user's status, raises Sp. Atk, Sp. Def by 1.

Volt Tackle.name: Volt Tackle
Volt Tackle.desc: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
Volt Tackle.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to paralyze target.

Zing Zap.name: Zing Zap
Zing Zap.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
Zing Zap.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Circle Throw.name: Circle Throw
Circle Throw.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target is under the effect of Ingrain, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.
Circle Throw.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

Tri Attack.name: Tri Attack
Tri Attack.desc: Has a 20% chance to either burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
Tri Attack.shortDesc: 20% chance to paralyze or burn or freeze target.

Work Up.name: Work Up
Work Up.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
Work Up.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

Aqua Step.name: Aqua Step
Aqua Step.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
Aqua Step.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

Thunderclap.name: Thunderclap
Thunderclap.desc: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
Thunderclap.shortDesc: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

Dragon Ascent.name: Dragon Ascent
Dragon Ascent.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
Dragon Ascent.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

Dragon Energy.name: Dragon Energy
Dragon Energy.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
Dragon Energy.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

Blue Flare.name: Blue Flare
Blue Flare.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

Grassy Glide.name: Grassy Glide
Grassy Glide.desc: If the current terrain is Grassy Terrain and the user is grounded, this move has its priority increased by 1.

Dual Wingbeat.name: Dual Wingbeat
Dual Wingbeat.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.

Ceaseless Edge.name: Ceaseless Edge
Ceaseless Edge.desc: If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. A maximum of three layers may be set, and opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
Ceaseless Edge.shortDesc: Sets a layer of Spikes on the opposing side.

Razor Shell.name: Razor Shell
Razor Shell.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
Razor Shell.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Bug Bite.name: Bug Bite
Bug Bite.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
Bug Bite.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

Sunny Day.name: Sunny Day
Sunny Day.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
Sunny Day.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

Seed Flare.name: Seed Flare
Seed Flare.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
Seed Flare.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

Tailwind.name: Tailwind
Tailwind.desc: For 4 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
Tailwind.shortDesc: For 4 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

Matcha Gotcha.name: Matcha Gotcha
Matcha Gotcha.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
Matcha Gotcha.shortDesc: 20% burn. Recovers 50% dmg dealt. Thaws foe(s).

Hex.name: Hex
Hex.desc: Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
Hex.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.

Torch Song.name: Torch Song
